channel.title: CVE Feed for Themis Solutions, Inc. -- Clio Grow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themis Solutions, Inc. -- Clio Grow

item.title: CVE-2024-49276|2024-10-17T20:05:21.744Z -- themis%20solutions%2C%20inc. -- clio%20grow
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themis Solutions, Inc. Clio Grow allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Clio Grow: from n/a through 1.0.2.
